feed.title: 4cushion
feed.subtitle: Bringing Creativity, Customization, Color, and Craftsmanship to your wrist. Every detail is crafted with passion—this is 4cushion.

entry.title: DGT504 - hybrid watch face
entry.content:
Everyday hybrid watch face with digital time, analog hands, and wellness info.

4CS DGT504 – A Smart & Stylish Hybrid Watch Face for Your Galaxy Watch

Upgrade your Galaxy Watch with 4CS DGT504, a clean and modern hybrid watch face that blends digital functionality with analog elegance. Designed for everyday use, this watch face provides essential health and weather info at a glance — all wrapped in a casually stylish layout.

✨ Features

  • Digital time display (12/24H supported)
  • Analog hands (hour, minute, second)
  • Steps counter
  • Heart rate monitor
  • Battery level indicator
  • Date and day of the week
  • Weather information
  • AM/PM indicator
  • Watch charging status
  • Multiple color accents, including Red and Yellow.

Release Date: April 14, 2025

Get it on Google Play

#minimal watch face #artwatch #galaxywatch #wearOS #러브컨셉 #watchfacedesign #4cushion #androvena #lovewatchface #analogdigitalhybrid
entry.summary: Everyday hybrid watch face with digital time, analog hands, and wellness info.

entry.title: GRF503 - classic watch face
entry.content:
Elegant dual-tone classic watch face with tourbillon-style gear and smart info.love through time.

4CS GRF503 classic watch face brings timeless elegance and technical artistry to your wrist. Crafted with inspiration from traditional mechanical watches, this design features a dual-tone face, roman numeral indexes, and a tourbillon-style rotating gear that delivers a touch of mechanical sophistication.

✨ Key Features:

Dual-tone aesthetic: metallic light + deep brushed blue

Tourbillon-inspired gear (rotating animation)

Roman numeral index in classic style

Real-time weather, date, day, and battery display

Customize gear visibility: none, top, bottom, or both

Change watch hands and dial index style

Supports 12/24h format & °C/°F for temperature

Optimized for Wear OS smartwatches

Release Date: March 24, 2025

Get it on Google Play

#minimal watch face #artwatch #galaxywatch #wearOS #러브컨셉 #watchfacedesign #4cushion #androvena #lovewatchface #analogdigitalhybrid
entry.summary: Elegant dual-tone classic watch face with tourbillon-style gear and smart info.love through time.

entry.title: Androvena - art watch face
entry.content:
사랑의 순간을 담은 시계, Androvena
A watch face that captures the beauty of love in time — Androvena.

4CS Androvena는 시침(남성)과 분침(여성)이 만나 사랑의 흐름을 표현하는 특별한 워치 페이스입니다.
4CS Androvena is a unique art watch face where the hour hand (masculine) and minute hand (feminine) meet — symbolizing the passage of love through time.

단순히 시간을 보여주는 시계를 넘어, 연인 간의 소중한 순간을 감성적으로 담아내는 예술적 디자인이 특징입니다.
Beyond simply telling time, Androvena turns your Galaxy Watch into an emotional space where moments of love live on.

출시일: 2025년 2월 23일

Release Date: February 23, 2025

Get it on Google Play

#minimal watch face #artwatch #galaxywatch #wearOS #러브컨셉 #watchfacedesign #4cushion #androvena #lovewatchface #analogdigitalhybrid
entry.summary: 사랑의 순간을 담은 시계, Androvena A watch face that captures the beauty of love in time — Androvena.

entry.title: KZF501 - hybrid watch face
entry.content:
The 4CS KZF501 is a hybrid watch face designed for Galaxy Watch and other Wear OS smartwatches.
With a combination of analog style and digital elements, this Wear OS watch face brings a unique experience to your wrist.

🔍 Keywords:

  • Galaxy Watch face
  • Wear OS hybrid face
  • modern watch face design
  • digital + analog watch face
  • battery efficient smartwatch face
  • customizable Wear OS face
  • mechanical style watch face

Now available on Google Play Store.

Download 4CS KZF501 on Google Play

4CS KZF501은 갤럭시 워치 및 Wear OS 스마트워치를 위한 하이브리드 워치 페이스입니다.
기계식 스타일과 디지털 정보를 조합해 일상과 비즈니스 모두에 어울리는 워치 디자인을 제공합니다.

주요 검색어:

  • 갤럭시 워치 페이스
  • Wear OS 시계 화면
  • 하이브리드 시계 디자인
  • 배터리 절약 워치페이스
  • 커스터마이징 가능한 워치페이스

지금 구글 플레이 스토어에서 만나보세요.

Google Play에서 4CS KZF501 다운로드
entry.summary: The 4CS KZF501 is a hybrid watch face designed for Galaxy Watch and other Wear OS smartwatches. With a combination of analog style and digital elements, this Wear OS watch face brings a unique experience to your wrist.

entry.title: hellosee - 음성을 보는 즐거움
entry.content:
hellosee는 이제 Google Play에서 만나보실 수 있습니다! 2024년 3월 28일에 출시된 이 앱은 음성을 시각적으로 경험할 수 있는 새로운 방법을 제공하며, 여러분의 일상에 즐거움을 더해드립니다.

Available now on Google Play
